verses.verse: Then I-yov <WH347> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799>,
I have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> many such things <WH7227>: miserable <WH5999> comforters <WH5162> <WH8764> are ye all.
Shall vain <WH7307> words <WH1697> have an end <WH7093>? or what emboldeneth <WH4834> <WH8686> thee that thou answerest <WH6030> <WH8799> ?

I also could speak <WH1696> <WH8762> as ye do: if <WH3863> your soul <WH5315> were <WH3426> in my soul's <WH5315> stead, I could heap up <WH2266> <WH8686> words <WH4405> against you, and shake <WH5128> <WH8686> mine head <WH7218> at <WH1119> you.
But I would strengthen <WH553> <WH8762> you with <WH1119> my mouth <WH6310>, and the moving <WH5205> of my lips <WH8193> should asswage <WH2820> <WH8799> your grief.
Though I speak <WH1696> <WH8762>, my grief <WH3511> is not asswaged <WH2820> <WH8735>: and though I forbear <WH2308> <WH8799>, what am I eased <WH1980> <WH8799> ?
But now he hath made me weary <WH3811> <WH8689>: thou hast made desolate <WH8074> <WH8689> all my company <WH5712>.

And thou hast filled me with wrinkles <WH7059> <WH8799>, which is a witness <WH5707> against me: and my leanness <WH3585> rising up <WH6965> <WH8799> in me beareth witness <WH6030> <WH8799> to my face <WH6440>.

He teareth <WH2963> <WH8804> me in his wrath <WH639>, who hateth <WH7852> <WH8799> me: he gnasheth <WH2786> <WH8804> upon me with his teeth <WH8127>; mine enemy <WH6862> sharpeneth <WH3913> <WH8799> his eyes <WH5869> upon me.

They have gaped <WH6473> <WH8804> upon me with their mouth <WH6310>; they have smitten <WH5221> <WH8689> me upon the cheek <WH3895> reproachfully <WH2781>; they have gathered <WH4390> <WH8691> themselves together <WH3162> against me.
'Elohim <WH410> hath delivered <WH5462> <WH8686> me to the ungodly <WH5760>, and turned me over <WH3399> <WH8804> into the hands <WH3027> of the wicked <WH7563>.

I was at ease <WH7961>, but he hath broken me asunder <WH6565> <WH8770>: he hath also taken <WH270> <WH8804> me by my neck <WH6203>, and shaken me to pieces <WH6327> <WH8770>, and set me up <WH6965> <WH8686> for his mark <WH4307>.

His archers <WH7228> compass me round about <WH5437> <WH8799>, he cleaveth <WH6398> my reins <WH3629> asunder <WH6398> <WH8762>, and doth not spare <WH2550> <WH8799>; he poureth out <WH8210> <WH8799> my gall <WH4845> upon the ground <WH776>.
He breaketh <WH6555> <WH8799> me with breach <WH6556> upon <WH6440> breach <WH6556>, he runneth <WH7323> <WH8799> upon me like a giant <WH1368>.
I have sewed <WH8609> <WH8804> sackcloth <WH8242> upon my skin <WH1539>, and defiled <WH5953> <WH8782> my shofar <WH7161> in the dust <WH6083>.
My face <WH6440> is foul <WH2560> <WH8777> with weeping <WH1065>, and on my eyelids <WH6079> is the shadow of death <WH6757>;
Not for any injustice <WH2555> in mine hands <WH3709>: also my prayer <WH8605> is pure <WH2134>.
O earth <WH776>, cover <WH3680> <WH8762> not thou my blood <WH1818>, and let my cry <WH2201> have no place <WH4725>.
Also now, behold, my witness <WH5707> is in heaven <WH8064>, and my record <WH7717> is on high <WH4791>.
My friends <WH7453> scorn <WH3887> <WH8688> me: but mine eye <WH5869> poureth out <WH1811> <WH8804> tears unto 'Elohim <WH433>.
O that one might plead <WH3198> <WH8686> for a man <WH1397> with 'Elohim <WH433>, as a man <WH120> pleadeth for his neighbour <WH1121> <WH7453> !
When a few <WH4557> years <WH8141> are come <WH857> <WH8799>, then I shall go <WH1980> <WH8799> the way <WH734> whence I shall not return <WH7725> <WH8799>.
